author: aster94
body:
# Colors also for Write-Debug
Some people (maybe only me? 🤔) would like to have different colors for different purpose debug messages


## What these people would like to happen
color support like `Write-Host`
```
Write-Debug "ohhh this shouldn't have happened but we would survive" -ForegroundColor yellow
Write-Debug "mmmm no, this is definitely not good" -ForegroundColor red
```
title: Feature Request - colors also for Write-Debug
